name: Wild Tunes Lite
description:
wild Tunes is a musical cartoon game for kids and toddlers, with educational purpose.
wild Tunes was made in part of ongoing production of eco-friendly games that will support our plant and needed animals worldwide.

Best game for kids! have great fun play music with cartoon animals in the farm and around the world!

Each animal got a special tune to have fun with, accompanied with original score music!

your child can now play with the animals to create happy and funny songs!

Feature:
- 4 unique screens with different animals and music.
- one touch to play/stop animal
- lock slider to prevent accidental exit.
- ideal for kids toddlers and family.

For limited time only!!!
Free new screen to play with in the following month! More fun guaranteed!
